channel.title: A Software Craftsman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on A Software Craftsman's Blog

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Abhay, and I am a software engineer currently working on the Blockchain team at Facebook. I believe I have found my ikigai in building high-quality software systems, and hope to share my passion for the craft with readers of this blog. I hope you find something interesting.
